short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks if the current site is similar to the specified target site URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Configure monitoring for several websites, and if a user visits a website with a URL similar to those being monitored, provide the user with a pop-up warning that they may be visiting a phishing website.
